sentences.sContent: I suddenly felt the fishing line tauten.
sentences.sContent_eng: I suddenly felt the fishing line tauten.
sentences.sCn: 我突然感到鱼竿的绳子拉紧了。

sentences.sContent: Some of them squat with horse stance, with their teeth clenched, tauten the rope;
sentences.sContent_eng: Some of them squat with horse stance, with their teeth clenched, tauten the rope;
sentences.sCn: 有的蹲住马步，咬紧牙关，拉紧绳子；

trans.tranOther: to make something stretch tight, or to become stretched tight
